42 // Forward declarations

44 class BlockRange;
45 template <typename T, typename A = Eigen::aligned_allocator<T>>
46 class Tensor;
47 template <typename>
48 class Tile;

50 namespace detail {
51 
52 // Forward declarations
53 template <typename T, typename R, typename = Tensor<std::remove_const_t<T>>>
54 class TensorInterface;
55 template <typename>
56 class ShiftWrapper;
57 
58 // Type traits for detecting tensors and tensors of tensors.
59 // is_tensor_helper tests if individual types are tensors, while is_tensor
60 // tests a pack of types. Similarly is_tensor_of_tensor tests if
61 // one or more types are tensors of tensors.
62 // To extend the definition of tensors and tensors of tensor, add additional
63 // is_tensor_helper and is_tensor_of_tensor_helper (partial) specializations.
64 // Note: These type traits help differentiate different implementation
65 // functions for tensors, so a tensor of tensors is not considered a tensor.
66 
67 template <typename... Ts>
68 struct is_tensor;
69 template <typename... Ts>
70 struct is_tensor_of_tensor;
71 
72 template <typename>
73 struct is_tensor_helper : public std::false_type {};
74 
75 template <typename T, typename A>
76 struct is_tensor_helper<Tensor<T, A>> : public std::true_type {};
77 
78 template <typename... Args>
79 struct is_tensor_helper<TensorInterface<Args...>> : public std::true_type {};
80 
81 template <typename T>
82 struct is_tensor_helper<ShiftWrapper<T>> : public is_tensor_helper<T> {};
83 
84 template <typename T>
85 struct is_tensor_helper<ShiftWrapper<const T>> : public is_tensor_helper<T> {};
86 
87 template <typename T>
88 struct is_tensor_helper<Tile<T>> : public is_tensor_helper<T> {};
89 
90 template <typename T>
91 struct is_tensor_of_tensor_helper : public std::false_type {};
92 
93 template <typename T, typename A>
94 struct is_tensor_of_tensor_helper<Tensor<T, A>> : public is_tensor_helper<T> {};
95 
96 template <typename T, typename... Args>
97 struct is_tensor_of_tensor_helper<TensorInterface<T, Args...>>
98  : public is_tensor_helper<T> {};
99 
100 template <typename T>
101 struct is_tensor_of_tensor_helper<ShiftWrapper<T>>
102  : public is_tensor_of_tensor_helper<T> {};
103 
104 template <typename T>
105 struct is_tensor_of_tensor_helper<Tile<T>>
106  : public is_tensor_of_tensor_helper<T> {};
107 
108 template <>
109 struct is_tensor<> : public std::false_type {};
110 
111 template <typename T>
112 struct is_tensor<T> {
113  static constexpr bool value =
114  is_tensor_helper<T>::value && !is_tensor_of_tensor_helper<T>::value;
115 };
116 
117 template <typename T1, typename T2, typename... Ts>
118 struct is_tensor<T1, T2, Ts...> {
119  static constexpr bool value =
120  is_tensor<T1>::value && is_tensor<T2, Ts...>::value;
121 };
122 
125 template <typename... Ts>
126 constexpr const bool is_tensor_v = is_tensor<Ts...>::value;
127 
128 template <>
129 struct is_tensor_of_tensor<> : public std::false_type {};
130 
131 template <typename T>
132 struct is_tensor_of_tensor<T> {
133  static constexpr bool value = is_tensor_of_tensor_helper<T>::value;
134 };
135 
136 template <typename T1, typename T2, typename... Ts>
137 struct is_tensor_of_tensor<T1, T2, Ts...> {
138  static constexpr bool value =
139  is_tensor_of_tensor<T1>::value && is_tensor_of_tensor<T2, Ts...>::value;
140 };
141 
145 template <typename... Ts>
146 constexpr const bool is_tensor_of_tensor_v = is_tensor_of_tensor<Ts...>::value;
147 
148 // Test if the tensor is contiguous
149 
150 template <typename T>
151 struct is_contiguous_range_helper : public std::false_type {};
152 
153 template <>
154 struct is_contiguous_range_helper<Range> : public std::true_type {};
155 
156 template <typename T>
157 struct is_contiguous_tensor_helper : public std::false_type {};
158 
159 template <typename T, typename A>
160 struct is_contiguous_tensor_helper<Tensor<T, A>> : public std::true_type {};
161 
162 template <typename T, typename R, typename OpResult>
163 struct is_contiguous_tensor_helper<TensorInterface<T, R, OpResult>>
164  : public is_contiguous_range_helper<R> {};
165 
166 template <typename T>
167 struct is_contiguous_tensor_helper<ShiftWrapper<T>>
168  : public is_contiguous_tensor_helper<T> {};
169 
170 template <typename T>
171 struct is_contiguous_tensor_helper<Tile<T>>
172  : public is_contiguous_tensor_helper<T> {};
173 
174 template <typename... Ts>
175 struct is_contiguous_tensor;
176 
177 template <>
178 struct is_contiguous_tensor<> : public std::false_type {};
179 
180 template <typename T>
181 struct is_contiguous_tensor<T> : public is_contiguous_tensor_helper<T> {};
182 
183 template <typename T1, typename T2, typename... Ts>
184 struct is_contiguous_tensor<T1, T2, Ts...> {
185  static constexpr bool value = is_contiguous_tensor_helper<T1>::value &&
186  is_contiguous_tensor<T2, Ts...>::value;
187 };
188 
192 template <typename... Ts>
193 constexpr const bool is_contiguous_tensor_v =
194  is_contiguous_tensor<Ts...>::value;
195 
196 // Test if the tensor is shifted
197 
198 template <typename T>
199 struct is_shifted_helper : public std::false_type {};
200 
201 template <typename T>
202 struct is_shifted_helper<ShiftWrapper<T>> : public std::true_type {};
203 
204 template <typename... Ts>
205 struct is_shifted;
206 
207 template <>
208 struct is_shifted<> : public std::false_type {};
209 
210 template <typename T>
211 struct is_shifted<T> : public is_shifted_helper<T> {};
212 
213 template <typename T1, typename T2, typename... Ts>
214 struct is_shifted<T1, T2, Ts...> {
215  static constexpr bool value =
216  is_shifted_helper<T1>::value && is_shifted<T2, Ts...>::value;
217 };
218 
221 template <typename... Ts>
222 constexpr const bool is_shifted_v = is_shifted<Ts...>::value;
223 
224 // check if reduce_op can reduce set of types
225 template <typename Enabler, typename ReduceOp, typename Result,
226  typename... Args>
227 struct is_reduce_op_ : public std::false_type {};
228 
229 template <typename ReduceOp, typename Result, typename... Args>
230 struct is_reduce_op_<
231  std::void_t<decltype(std::declval<ReduceOp&>()(
232  std::declval<Result&>(), std::declval<const Args*>()...))>,
233  ReduceOp, Result, Args...> : public std::true_type {};
234 
235 template <typename ReduceOp, typename Result, typename... Args>
236 constexpr const bool is_reduce_op_v =
237  is_reduce_op_<void, ReduceOp, Result, Args...>::value;
238 
240 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
241 template <typename T>
242 struct is_cuda_tile : public std::false_type {};
243 
244 template <typename T>
245 struct is_cuda_tile<Tile<T>> : public is_cuda_tile<T> {};
246 
247 template <typename T, typename Op>
248 struct is_cuda_tile<LazyArrayTile<T, Op>>
249  : public is_cuda_tile<typename LazyArrayTile<T, Op>::eval_type> {};
250 #endif

252 } // namespace detail
253 } // namespace TiledArray
